mapper.insert: insert into pro (pro_title, date_start, date_end, pro_link, pro_git, pro_img, pro_content,pro_info) values (#{proTitle},#{dateStart},#{dateEnd},#{proLink},#{proGit},#{proImg},#{proContent},#{proInfo})
mapper.update: update pro set pro_title = #{proTitle}, date_start = #{dateStart}, date_end = #{dateEnd}, pro_link = #{proLink}, pro_git = #{proGit}, pro_img = #{proImg}, pro_content = #{proContent}, pro_info = #{proInfo}, pro_status = #{proStatus} where pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from pro JOIN (select pro_id, pro_value from pro_type where pro_value = #{proType} ) type ON pro.pro_id = type.pro_id
